TopicTitle: How to edit VAB/SPH and flight sounds?

Articles.Content: I know there are listed sounds for nature, and the effects of clicking and editing in the VAB and SPH, but I cannot locate the background music. I also cannot find the space ambience tunes ore the intro theme. anyone know how I could possibly edit these or add in my own?

I know there are listed sounds for nature, and the effects of clicking and editing in the VAB and SPH, but I cannot locate the background music. I also cannot find the space ambience tunes ore the intro theme. anyone know how I could possibly edit these or add in my own?

most of those are locked in the unity stuff.

best to not mess with it.

D: ok thats what I thought... I was just hoping I could add some home-made marimba and piano tracks or something...

Do you know of any mods that have custom sounds?
